message: I'm willing to share 90% of the money with you. Let's get this done quickly.

I'm willing to give you a bit more this time, but I need to get a bigger share. Let's reach a deal before the money keeps losing value.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 80/20 this time. We both get a decent amount, and we avoid losing more money to inflation.
